description: Variation or discharge of condition 4, 5, 6A, 6B, 7(ii), 8, 11A, 11B,  13, 19A  B, 20, 22, 24, 25, 26, 27, 28, 29, 30A, 30B, 37 and 38A of planning permission dated 29th June 2022 (RN:21/02892/FULL) for the Variation of Condition 1 (approved plans and documents) of planning permission dated 3 July 2020 (RN: 19/04487/FULL) for: Demolition of existing buildings and structures and construction of a new mixed-use development comprising hotel and associated facilities (Class C1), flexible workspace (Class B1a / B1c), retail and food and beverage (Class A1 / A3), events space (Sui Generis) and a replacement street cleaning depot (Sui Generis) with associated new public realm and highways improvements.  (site includes Taxi House, Waterside House and Westminster Street Sweepers Depot). Namely, Updated Class E uses (and performance and event space) and layout for the LG  UG of the main building and Pavilion,revised ancillary hotel space to include laundry facility, amendments to the hotel amenity areas at LG, UG and L10, East elevation Level 06 windows, revised Basement footprint and design to cycle store layout. Details of matters required under conditions. RECONSULTATION to include external staircase to canalside area in place of approved ramp.
